tool.name: SAGA.ta_morphometry.27
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayDEM False output_data_EXPOSITION $output_data_EXPOSITION name SAGA.ta_morphometry.27 DEM $DEM MAXDIST $MAXDIST STEP $STEP OLDVER $OLDVER ACCEL $ACCEL PYRAMIDS $PYRAMIDS prefer $prefer response $response outputType_EXPOSITION $OutputSection_EXPOSITION.outputType_EXPOSITION transmissionMode_EXPOSITION $OutputSection_EXPOSITION.transmissionMode_EXPOSITION

param.name: DEM
param.label: Elevation
param.help: Elevation The following data types are allowed in the txt file: tiff, x-ogc-envi, png, x-ogc-aaigrid

param.name: OLDVER
param.label: Old Version
param.help: use old version for constant wind direction (no acceleration and averaging option)

param.name: PYRAMIDS
param.label: Elevation Averaging
param.help: use more averaged elevations when looking at increasing distances

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_EXPOSITION
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_EXPOSITION
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: This tool calculates the average 'Wind Effect Index' for all directions using an angular step. Like the 'Wind Effect Index' it is a dimensionless index. Values below 1 indicate wind shadowed areas whereas values above 1 indicate areas exposed to wind.
